title: Contact number chooses randomly
content:
My Google pixel has a very annoying issue every time I choose a contact to call it will always call the number on the bottom or the number which isn't default . 

Contact should automatically choose the default number on the contact unless I choose a non default contact . This issue is really annoying . I don't know if anyone has this issue but it's really really annoying. Please help this bug . This issue makes me angry hope this solves. 

Please feel free if any Google 4xl users facing the same issue
